info.title: Organization Units API
info.description:
The Organization Units API enables you to manage B2B functionalities in your VTEX store, focusing on user and unit organization. This API provides endpoints for managing users, organization units, and their associated scopes.

>⚠️ Deprecation Notice
The `api/units/v1` prefix is being deprecated in favor of the new `api/organization-units/v1` prefix. Both prefixes will be supported until June 30, 2025, after which the old prefix will be removed on July 1, 2025. Please update your integrations accordingly.

## Index

### Users
- `GET` [Get user information](/api/license-manager/users/{userId}): Retrieves information about a specific user.
- `DELETE` [Delete user](/api/license-manager/users/{userId}): Deletes a specific user.
- `POST` [Create user](/api/license-manager/users): Creates a new user.
- `GET` [Get user scopes](/api/organization-units/v1/users/{userId}/scopes): Retrieves the scopes assigned to a user.
- `GET` [Get user unit](/api/organization-units/v1/{userId}/unit): Retrieves the organization unit associated with a user.
- `GET` [Get user ID by email](/api/vtexid/pvt/user/id): Retrieves the user ID associated with an email address.

### Units
- `POST` [Create unit](/api/organization-units/v1): Creates a new organization unit.
- `GET` [Get unit](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}): Retrieves information about a specific unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete unit](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}): Deletes a specific unit.
- `PATCH` [Rename unit](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}): Updates the name of a unit.
- `GET` [Get unit children](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/children): Retrieves the child units of a specific unit.
- `GET` [Get root units](/api/organization-units/v1/root): Retrieves all root-level units.
- `POST` [Move unit](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/move): Moves a unit to a new parent unit.
- `GET` [Search units](/api/organization-units/v1/search): Searches for organization units.
- `GET` [Get all units from scope value](/api/organization-units/v1/scopes/{scopeType}/{value}/units): Retrieves all units associated with a specific scope value.
- `GET` [Get all units from scope value - customField](/api/organization-units/v1/scopes/customFields/{value}/units): Retrieves all units associated with a specific custom field scope value.

### Scopes
- `GET` [Get unit scopes](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes): Retrieves all scopes associated with a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete all scopes](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes): Removes all scopes from a unit.

### Scope Contracts
- `POST` [Create scope contracts](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/contracts): Creates contract scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope contracts](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/contracts): Removes all contract scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope contracts](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/contracts): Updates contract scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope contracts](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/contracts/{value}): Removes a specific value from contract scopes.

### Scope Addresses
- `POST` [Create scope addresses](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/addresses): Creates address scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope addresses](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/addresses): Removes all address scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope addresses](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/addresses): Updates address scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope addresses](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/addresses/{value}): Removes a specific value from address scopes.

### Scope Payment Systems
- `POST` [Create scope payment systems](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/paymentSystems): Creates payment system scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope payment systems](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/paymentSystems): Removes all payment system scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope payment systems](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/paymentSystems): Updates payment system scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope payment systems](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/paymentSystems/{value}): Removes a specific value from payment system scopes.

### Scope Price Tables
- `POST` [Create scope price tables](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/priceTables): Creates price table scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope price tables](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/priceTables): Removes all price table scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope price tables](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/priceTables): Updates price table scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope price tables](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/priceTables/{value}): Removes a specific value from price table scopes.

### Scope Collections
- `POST` [Create scope collections](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/collections): Creates collection scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope collections](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/collections): Removes all collection scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope collections](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/collections): Updates collection scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope collections](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/collections/{value}): Removes a specific value from collection scopes.

### Scope Credit Cards
- `POST` [Create scope credit cards](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/creditCards): Creates credit card scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope credit cards](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/creditCards): Removes all credit card scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope credit cards](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/creditCards): Updates credit card scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Remove value from scope credit cards](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/creditCards/{value}): Removes a specific value from credit card scopes.

### Scope Custom Fields
- `POST` [Create scope custom fields](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/customFields): Creates custom field scopes for a unit.
- `DELETE` [Delete scope custom fields](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/customFields): Removes all custom field scopes from a unit.
- `PUT` [Update scope custom fields](/api/organization-units/v1/{unitId}/scopes/customFields): Updates custom field scopes for a unit.

### Shopper Data
- `GET` [Get shopper schema](/api/organization-units/v1/shopper/schema): Retrieves the shopper document schema.
- `POST` [Create shopper document](/api/organization-units/v1/shopper/documents): Creates a new shopper document.
- `GET` [Get shopper document](/api/organization-units/v1/shopper/documents/{userId}): Retrieves a shopper document by user ID.
- `GET` [Search shopper document](/api/organization-units/v1/shopper/documents/search): Searches for shopper documents.

## Common parameters

| Parameter name | Description | Type |
| - | - | - |
| `accountName` | Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable. |
| `environment` | Environment to use. Used as part of the URL. | Server variable. |
| `VtexIdclientAutCookie` | [User token](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-user-tokens), valid for 24 hours. | Authentication header. |

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

get.description: Retrieves the scopes assigned to a specific user.

schema.description: Response object containing the contract IDs representing user scopes.

contractIds.description: List of contract IDs representing user scopes.

get.description: Retrieves the organization unit associated with a specific user.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the unit assignment was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the unit assignment was last updated.

ids.description: The path of unit IDs from root to current unit.

names.description: The path of unit names from root to current unit (can be empty).

id.description: The unique identifier of the unit.

customerGroup.description: The customer group associated with this unit.

customerIds.description: List of customer IDs associated with this unit.

post.description:
Creates a new organization unit.

> ⚠️ Deprecation Notice
> The `api/units/v1` prefix is being deprecated in favor of the new `api/organization-units/v1` prefix. Both prefixes will be supported until June 30, 2025, after which the old prefix will be removed on July 1, 2025. Please update your integrations accordingly.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent update.

customerIds.description: List of associated customer IDs (can be empty).
